skills.title: Veil of Shadows Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between three choices at any time

JA_children.title: Dark Thorn
JA_children.description: 20% increased damage to nearby enemies when activating VEIL OF SHADOWS.

JA_children.title: Night Terror
JA_children.description: Increases the duration of Veil of Shadows by 3 seconds and increases Critical Attack Chance by 25%.

JA_children.title: Shadow Gifts
JA_children.description: Enemies Defeated while Veil of Shadows is active have a 35% chance to drop Heroic Orbs.

skills.title: Veil of Shadows Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time

JA_children.title: Eclipse
JA_children.description: Increases range of Veil of Shadows by 30%.

JA_children.title: Visus Obscuram
JA_children.description: Increases the duration that teammates remain invisible after being cloaked by Veil of Shadows by 5 seconds.

JA_children.title: Mortal Cloak
JA_children.description: Increases Critical Attack Chance for teammates cloaked by Veil of Shadows by 30

skills.title: Widow's Bite Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Superstatic Dart
JA_children.description: Increases the range of the electric field generated by Widow’s Bite by 35%

JA_children.title: Taser Dart
JA_children.description: Widow’s Bite projectile attaches to the target instead of exploding and deals Shock damage.

JA_children.title: Lightning Fist
JA_children.description: Channels Widow’s Bite energy back into the gauntlet and turns the Heroic ability into a lightning fast melee attack that sends nearby enemies flying. Increases the charge of the Assault Heroic meter.

skills.title: Widow's Bite Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Paralyzing Bite
JA_children.description: Widow’s Bite inflicts 40% more Stun damage increasing the chance to Stun enemies

JA_children.title: Invigorating Bite
JA_children.description: Defeating at least one enemy with Widow’s Bite will recharge 20% of the Heroic energy for that ability

JA_children.title: Lethal Bite
JA_children.description: Hold an additional Widow’s Bite charge. Extra charges appear as small circles near the Assault heroic ability meter.

skills.title: Power Surge Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Galvanic Bite
JA_children.description: Increases damage of Widow’s Bite while Power Surge is active by 20%.

JA_children.title: Power Staff
JA_children.description: 35% increased damage for staff attacks while Overcharged while Power Surge ability is active.

JA_children.title: Vanquishing Surge
JA_children.description: Defeating enemies while Power Surge is active has a 15% chance to drop Regen Packs for all team members

skills.title: Power Surge Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Kilowatt
JA_children.description: Increases Stun damage while Power Surge is active by 30%.

JA_children.title: Power Grid
JA_children.description: Extends the duration of Power Surge by 4 seconds.

JA_children.title: Indomitable Force
JA_children.description: Increase the damage resistance to 30%, and reduce the severity of hit reactions for some enemy attacks when Power Surge is active.

skills.title: Intrinsic Charge Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Intrinsic Charge
JA_children.description: All attacks increase the charge rate of the intrinsic Shadow Ops meter by 15%

JA_children.title: Headshot Charge
JA_children.description: Headshot boost intrinsic Shadow Ops energy by 25 points

JA_children.title: Takedown Charge
JA_children.description: Takedowns boost an increased amount of intrinsic Shadow Ops energy by 20 points

skills.title: Overcharge Damage Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Overcharge Damage
JA_children.description: Increases all damage while Overcharged by 5%

JA_children.title: Overcharge Ranged
JA_children.description: Increases Ranged Attack damage while Overcharged by 10%

JA_children.title: Overcharge Critical
JA_children.description: Increases Critical Attack damage while Overcharged by 15%

skills.title: Overcharge Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Willpower Overcharge
JA_children.description: Recover 1 point of Willpower when dealing damage when Overcharged.

JA_children.title: Efficient Overcharge
JA_children.description: Increases the delay by 1 second before intrinsic Shadow Ops energy begins to deplete when not attacking enemies.

JA_children.title: Heroic Overcharge
JA_children.description: Increases the rate at which Heroic energy recharges while Overcharged by 15%.

skills.title: Grenade Type Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Hazard Grenade
JA_children.description: All grenades leave a lingering hazard zone around their detonation location that inflict increased Status damage.

JA_children.title: Proximity Grenade
JA_children.description: Grenades have a delayed detonation, exploding when enemies are nearby.

JA_children.title: Cluster Grenade
JA_children.description: Throws a spread of three grenades that inflict damage over a wider area.

skills.title: Grenade Status Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Thermite Grenade
JA_children.description: Adds significant Plasma damage to grenades.

JA_children.title: Flash Freeze Grenade
JA_children.description: Adds significant Cryo damage to grenades.

JA_children.title: Voltaic Grenade
JA_children.description: Adds significant Shock damage to grenades.

skills.title: Pistol Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Fast Reload
JA_children.description: Increases reload speed by 15%

JA_children.title: Recoil Compensator
JA_children.description: Reduces shot recoil by 15%, allowing for a steadier aim.

JA_children.title: Extended Magazine
JA_children.description: Increases the magazine size of all pistol variants decreasing reload frequency.

skills.title: Stealth Attack Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Defensive abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Invisible Stun
JA_children.description: Increases Stun damage while invisible 15%.

JA_children.title: Invisible Ranged
JA_children.description: Increases Ranged Attack damage while invisible by 12%.

JA_children.title: Invisible Status
JA_children.description: Increases all Status damage while invisible by 20%.

skills.title: Invisibility Specializtion
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Defensive abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Extended Invisibility
JA_children.description: Extends Invisibility granted from Veil of Shadows by 2 seconds.

JA_children.title: Invisible Recharge
JA_children.description: Heroic energy recharges 15% faster while invisible.

JA_children.title: Invisible Willpower
JA_children.description: Willpower regenerates at 1% per second while invisible.

skills.title: Stealth Tactics Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Defensive abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Critical Damage
JA_children.description: Increases Critical Attack damage while invisible by 15%.

JA_children.title: Critical Ranged
JA_children.description: Increases Critical Attack Chance 7% for Ranged Attacks while invisible.

JA_children.title: Critical Melee
JA_children.description: Increases Critical Attack Chance by 20% for Melee Attacks while invisible.

skills.title: Takedown Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Takedown abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Intrinsic Takedown Mastery
JA_children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns and Intrinsic Orb

JA_children.title: Heroic Takedown Mastery
JA_children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Heroic Orb

JA_children.title: Willpower Takedown Mastery
JA_children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Regen Pack.

skills.title: Ranged Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Critical Headshots
JA_children.description: Increases Critical attack damage from headshots by 20%.

JA_children.title: Stun Damage
JA_children.description: Increases Stun damage by 15%

JA_children.title: Ranged Damage
JA_children.description: Increases Ranged Attack damage by 10%

skills.title: Melee Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

JA_children.title: Combo Finishers
JA_children.description: Increases damage from Light Combo Finishers or Heavy Combo Finishers by 25%

JA_children.title: Critical Juggler
JA_children.description: Increases Critical Attack damage while air juggling enemies by 15%

JA_children.title: Melee Charge
JA_children.description: Light and heavy Attacks boost the energy of all heroic meters by 5%

skills.title: Boneshaker Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Rampaging Boneshaker
children.description: Defeat [five] enemies while BONESHAKER is active to extend its duration by [5] seconds.

children.title: Rampaging Boneshaker
children.description: Defeat [five] enemies while BONESHAKER is active in order to restore all Willpower.

children.title: Rampaging Boneshaker
children.description: Defeat [five] enemies while BONESHAKER is active to instantly refill all intrinsic RAGE energy.

skills.title: Boneshaker Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Savage Regeneration
children.description: Defeating enemies who are [TAUNTED] by BONESHAKER causes them to drop Regen Packs.

children.title: Savage Heroism
children.description: Defeating enemies who are [TAUNTED] by BONESHAKER causes them to drop Heroic Orbs.

children.title: Savage Intimidation
children.description: Attacks from [TAUNTED] enemies have reduced impact.

skills.title: Stranglehold Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Heroic Destruction
children.description: [50%] chance defeating an enemy will generate a Heroic Orb.

children.title: Devastating Charge
children.description: Deal [200%] more [stun] damage at the end of the STRANGLEHOLD Heroic ability.

children.title: Irradiant Destruction
children.description: On the final slam, the impact causes a massive radial hazard of material of irradiated [Gamma] particles. As long as enemies are inside of the hazardous area, they will take a small amount of additional damage, as well as [Gamma] damage.

skills.title: Stranglehold Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Destructive Health
children.description: [50%] chance defeating an enemy will generate a Regen Pack.

children.title: Barbaric Charge
children.description: STRANGLEHOLD [taunts] nearby enemies and instantly Overcharges the intrinsic RAGE ability.

children.title: Barbaric Charge
children.description: Grants an additional charge of the STRANGLEHOLD Heroic ability.

skills.title: Thunderclap Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Epicenter
children.description: The distance of the THUNDERCLAP shockwave is increased by [30%].

children.title: Ground Zero
children.description: THUNDERCLAP creates a brief vacuum that draws in nearby enemies before launching them upwards with the attack. The attack creates a [Gamma] radiation zone that inflicts [Gamma] damage to affected enemies but regenerates [2%] Willpower every second for teammates within the area.

children.title: Fault Line
children.description: Focus the THUNDERCLAP shockwave into a narrower area of effect but increases both damage and [Stun] damage by [25%], demolishing enemies caught in the blast.

skills.title: Thunderclap Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Thunderclap Regeneration
children.description: There is a [50%] chance defeating enemies with THUNDERCLAP will cause them to drop Regen Packs.

children.title: Thunderclap Heroic Recovery
children.description: There is a [50%] chance defeating enemies with THUNDERCLAP will cause them to drop Heroic Orbs.

children.title: Thunderclap Taunt
children.description: Enemies who survive THUNDERCLAP become [TAUNTED].

skills.title: Grab Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Vice Grip
children.description: Attacks with held enemies are now protected from interruption from enemy attacks. However, the damage will still be applied.

children.title: Durable Bludgeon
children.description: Held enemies take 30% less damage on hit with Light Grab Combos.

children.title: Combatant Shield
children.description: Hold R2 while holding a grabbed enemy to absorb incoming damage. Forces dropping of enemies when successful.

skills.title: Grab Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Hard Swings
children.description: Increases damage and impact of held enemies by 20%.

children.title: Enhanced Grab
children.description: 15% improved chance grab attempts will succeed against evasive enemies.

children.title: Regen Slams
children.description: Slamming held enemies with Heavy Attacks has a 15% chance to generate Regen Packs.

skills.title: Takedown Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Willpower Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Regen Pack.

children.title: Heroic Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Heroic Orb.

children.title: Willpower Recovery
children.description: Recovers 35 points of Willpower after performing a Takedown.

skills.title: Projectile Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Rubble
children.description: Thrown debris of any size explodes on impact, inflicting normal and Stun damage over a wide area.

children.title: Bedrock
children.description: Increases damage from thrown small debris by 15% and allows small debris chunks to pin enemies hit by the attack.

children.title: Wrecking Ball
children.description: Large debris does not break apart when thrown, instead rolling on the ground inflicting damage to every enemy hit by the attack. Multiple combatants can be pinned by the projectile when thrown.

skills.title: Damage Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Ranged Damage
children.description: Increases Ranged Attack damage by 15%.

children.title: Fastball
children.description: Thrown enemies travel faster and inflict 15% more damage against combatants they hit.

children.title: Meteor Damage
children.description: Increases damage by 15% when using large debris as a thrown projectile.

skills.title: Efficiency Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Hand Cannon
children.description: Increases Light and Heavy Attack damage by 33.3% when using small debris as a melee weapon.

children.title: Excavator
children.description: Increases speed of picking up both large and small debris chunks by 15%.

children.title: Meteoric
children.description: Increases the durability and damage of large debris chunks by 33.3% when using the melee Light and Heavy Attack.

skills.title: Defense Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Raging Heroics
children.description: Increases charge rate of all Heroic meters by 15% while RAGE is active.

children.title: Raging Recovery
children.description: Recovers Willpower by 10% while RAGE is active and while dealing damage.

children.title: Raging Defense
children.description: Increases defensive strength by 15% while RAGE is active.

skills.title: Damage Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Enhanced Damage
children.description: Increases all damage by 15% while RAGE is active.

children.title: Enhanced Combo Finishers
children.description: Increases damage of Light and Heavy Combo Finishers by 25% while RAGE is active.

children.title: Enhanced Bludgeon
children.description: Increases damage by 15% when using held enemies as a melee weapon while RAGE is active.

skills.title: Efficiency Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Berserker Rage
children.description: Increases the intrinsic energy gained by 15% when defeating combatants with held enemies.

children.title: Controlled Rage
children.description: Reduces the initial cost of triggering RAGE by 15%.

children.title: Maximum Rage
children.description: Increases the maximum amount of intrinsic RAGE energy by 15%.

skills.title: Overcharge Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic Overcharge abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Impact Boost
children.description: Increases impact while Overcharged by 25% decreasing the chance enemies will be able to interrupt attacks.

children.title: Chance Boost
children.description: Increases Critical Attack Chance by 15% while Overcharged.

children.title: Defense Boost
children.description: Increases Defensive Strength by 15% while Overcharged.

skills.title: Damage Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic Overcharge abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Damage Boost
children.description: Increases all damage by 20% while Overcharged.

children.title: Stun Boost
children.description: Increases Stun damage while Overcharged by 30%, accelerating the rate at which enemy Stun meters fill.

children.title: Status Boost
children.description: Increases Status damage while Overcharged by 30%, accelerating the rate at which all Status meters fill.

skills.title: Efficiency Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic Overcharge abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Hot Head
children.description: Increases the amount of Overcharged intrinsic RAGE meter energy gained for all attacks by 20%.

children.title: Pancake
children.description: Increases Overcharge energy gained from Takedowns by 50%.

children.title: Temper
children.description: Reduces the rate at which Overcharged energy drains allowing you to stay Overcharged longer.
